alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 13 at 2:25PM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM TUESDAY TO 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet, locally up to 30 inches in the Upper Cottonwoods and Bear River Range. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM Tuesday to 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on mountain routes. Traction laws may be enacted.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
